channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- SmartTagPlugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- SmartTagPlugin

item.title: CVE-2022-24926|2024-08-03T04:29:01.659Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smarttagplugin
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in SmartTagPlugin prior to version 1.2.15-6 allows privileged attackers to trigger a XSS on a victim's devices.

item.title: CVE-2022-36859|2024-08-03T10:14:28.944Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smarttagplugin
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in SmartTagPlugin prior to version 1.2.21-6 allows privileged attackers to trigger a XSS on a victim's devices.
